description: Crow Holdings Capital is a U.S. SEC-registered investment adviser and is the manager to the Crow Holdings Capital Funds. Crow Holdings Capital, Trammell Crow Residential, Crow Holdings Industrial, and Crow Holdings Office are operated separately and independently from one another with separate senior leadership and investment committees. Partner Solutions is an investment division of Crow Holdings Capital that provides strategic capital to real estate investors, including property operators, developers, and sponsors. Partner Solutions works with its investment partners to achieve growth and liquidity objectives, while leveraging the resources, network, and legacy of Crow Holdings.
